com.mapgroup.classificator.controller

Class UploadExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapgroup.classificator.controller.UploadExecutor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IServerExecutor

    public class UploadExecutor
extends java.lang.Object
implements IServerExecutor
    This class provide a way in order to manage the file uploading done by the client.

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • executeCommand

        public ServerResponse executeCommand(ContextRequest contextRequest)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Manages the upload request made by the user and provides a way in order to save the file that the user want to upload in a specific folder of the server.

        All the information are contained in the specified request which is used in order to complete the uploading process in a correct way.

        The context request structure must have these specific parameters in the order:

        • decision tree
        • dataset
        • file extension
        • the content of the file that will be uploaded
        • client ip address
        Specified by:
        executeCommand in interface IServerExecutor
        Parameters:
        contextRequest - information about the context in which the computation will be done
        Returns:
        the server response structure which contains the decision tree string representation and a message which displays the result
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - if some errors occurred in managing the upload

      • writeFileContent

        private java.lang.String writeFileContent(byte[] fileContent,
                                java.lang.String downDir,
                                java.lang.String extension,
                                java.lang.String clientHost)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the file content saved in the specified byte array in a file placed in the directory defined by downDir and which will have as extension the specified extension and as filename an available one generated from the client host ip address specified.
        Parameters:
        fileContent - the content of the file that will be uploaded
        downDir - the folder in which the file will be saved
        extension - the file's extension
        clientHost - the client that asks for the upload
        Returns:
        The complete filepath of the uploaded file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - if some errors occurs in writing the file
